Game.Name: Super Mario Bros. Special
Game.Plot: King Koopa is at it again! For the first time experience all of the excitement of the NEC-PC8801 on your home television screen! It takes only a few minutes to get hooked on the fun. For experts, we created a multitude of hidden surprises. It's spellbinding, irresistible, an all together new kind of game guaranteed to keep players coming back again and again. To save the princess, the hero Mario, and his brother Luigi, are confronted with fast-action challenges and opportunities. They can shrink, grow, duck. break bricks, get flower power, conquer dragons and zip through worlds in the warp zone. Old and new faces are around every corner. The surprises are never ending in Super Mario Bros. Special. -Old enemies from the hit series Donkey Kong are out to try and stop Mario again. -For Two Player action play as Mario and Luigi.
